title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2D.52 - Slow Vehicle Turn-Out Sign (D17-7)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2D.52 - Slow Vehicle Turn-Out Sign (D17-7)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 02. INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 01A Regulatory signs shall not be used in conjunction with
the Slow Vehicle Turn-Out sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17

2D.52

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
